column1: Baby Barnaby's////In terms of starting your day off right
column2: this place is tops. You really can't go wrong with delicious food
column4: and a huge carafe of coffee on your table. The Corned Beef Hash and Eggs is spectacular and addicting. The Green Eggs always leave me thinking about the next time I can come back. I usually try to go early
column5: but even when there's a wait it's totally worth it. The staff is friendly and always make you feel welcome.
